author: hgc-tpg
body:
**This PR depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#24**

#### PR description:
- Add possibility to split/share module energies between towers
  - Study presented in HGCAL TPG meeting [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1060474/#sc-8-4-stage-1-module-splittin) 
- Improve normalization used in seeding 
  - Study with jets presented [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1055905/#5-updates-on-cluster-seeding-s)
  - Study with e/g presented [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1075714/#3-study-of-seeding-normalizati)
- Fixes in Module and Backend DetIds

Associated internal PRs and reviews:
- PFCal-dev#468
- PFCal-dev#495
- PFCal-dev#501
- PFCal-dev#472
- hgc-tpg#8
- hgc-tpg#9

#### PR validation:
Tested D86, D92, D94 workflows
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 20034.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D86
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 22434.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D92
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 23234.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D94
```
title: [HGCAL trigger] Module splitting and updated seeding normalization
